title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.2 - Wharfage, nonapplication
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.2 - Wharfage, nonapplication

State Regulations

Wharfage will not be assessed against: (a) Intra-harbor watercraft discharging or
loading cargo destined to or from oceangoing vessels where the oceangoing
vessel is liable for the charge. (b) Intra-harbor watercraft discharging or loading waterborne cargo destined to or
from public warehouses at Port Authority marine terminals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1243.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
